channel.title: Commands disconnect people
channel.description: i made a server and it was working fine b ut then i got 100 errors for my compiler when i was editing it so i fixed it. i ran the server and it worked. but then when i tried the commands it disconnects people. please tell me what to do? thank you

item.title: Commands disconnect people
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

yeah heres when i log in and i try to do a command [client-1-John]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms] Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from John. java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -2 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:10775) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20420) at client.packetProcess(client.java:22432) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:279) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client John disconnected (localhost) Connection from localhost:2528 [client-1-John]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms]

Read full topic

item.title: Commands disconnect people
